A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Just terrible. Far too \"kiddy\" and far too many forced jokes that don't work. Sure\, Star Wars should have the occaisional gag but not one every two minutes. It was also way too long for no good reason. You know it's not good when you are just hoping for it to hurry up and end. Only good thing to say about it was that the special effects and general cinematography are excellent but everything else was a real step backwards\, so bad you might as well have brought JaJa Binks back into it. Such a let down after Rogue One being so fantastic. Luke Skywalker deserved better.
